SEARCH
Module com.kihachu.spaceiteration1
Package com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.model

Class Universe

java.lang.Object
com.kihachu.spaceiteration1.model.Universe
public class Universe extends Object
Represents the entire universe in the application. Manages the initialization and setup of all celestial bodies, asteroids, spacecraft, and the camera controller.
